column4: I am looking for a remote desktop program (client and server) that is easy to use and GUI (no terminal interface or commands required), i looked at VNC but it seemed to be all terminal commands according to man pages
there are gui clients for vnc (its just a protocol), about server guis i am not sure there is
ok well i have a remote desktop program (gui client) i think it was default with ubuntu, but im more concerned about the gui server
system - preferences -remote desktop (never used it myself yet though)
